mapper.sql: document_id, task_exec_id, doc_path, doc_unique_name, doc_class, doc_catagory, doc_name, person_id, version,gmt_modified
mapper.select:
select
from document where task_exec_id = #{taskExecId} order by document_id desc limit 1
select version from document where task_exec_id = #{taskExecId} order by version desc limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into document (document_id, task_exec_id, doc_path, doc_unique_name, doc_class, doc_catagory, doc_name, person_id, version,gmt_modified) values (#{documentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{taskExecId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{docPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docUniqueName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docCatagory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{docName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{personId,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gmtModified, jdbcType=INTEGER})

doc_path = #{docPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
